id: EPA to Eliminate Letter Grades for Some Project Reviews
paragraph:
November 17, 2018The Environmental Protection Agency will stop using letter grades on some of its environmental-permitting reviews, calling the process antiquated.The move is the latest step by the Trump-era EPA to simplify the federal permitting process, especially for highways, bridges and other infrastructure projects.
